name: Obama x Sangwoo Visual Novel
description:
Hello, I'm Richie! I'm new with ren'Py so this game is just me testing out the engine's functions and some cool pre-made functions I found online (linking them below)!  Furthermore, I will be releasing my actual serious visual novel around next year though~ So stay tuned to that! Don't mind the writing here >,< I wrote the dialogues on a whim. Anyways, I hope you'll enjoy this! Cheers.

LINKS FOR THE PRE-MADE FUNCTIONS I USED:

  • Parallax Menu

https://wattson.itch.io/kinetic-text-tags

  • Kinetic Text

https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=51&t=18047&start=15#p395928

  • Battle system

https://github.com/Gouvernathor/renpy-ChromaGlitch

  • Chroma Glitch effect
